Retrieving from UniProtKB or NCBI

12 months ago

SATurn can automatically retrieve sequences based on UniProtKB accessions or NCBI gene IDs (latter is broken because of an API change on the NCBI web-site)

Instructions

Step Preview
1. Click on the Protein Editor button
2. Enter UniProtKB accession or the NCBI Gene ID
(comma separated list)
3. Click fetch NCBI Gene or UniProtKB
